document.full_text: uganda and burundi said on saturday they have committed 3,000 extra troops to the african union mission in somalia, bolstering the fight against insurgents.
document.title: burundi, uganda to send 3,000 more troops to somalia
lines_and_colors: uganda and burundi said on saturday they have committed 3,000 extra troops to the african union mission in somalia, bolstering the fight against insurgents.
